section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This Order may be cited as the Boilers and Pressure Vessels (Forms) Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Form of certificates of fitness
section.content: The forms of certificates of fitness in respect of boilers and in respect of pressure vessels (other than pressurized fuel containers) issued under section 33 of the Ordinance shall respectively be in Forms 1 and 2 in the Schedule.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Form of application for registration
section.content: The form of application for registration of a boiler or a pressure vessel shall be in Form 3 in the Schedule.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Form of certificate of competency
section.content: The form of a certificate of competency shall be in Form 4 in the Schedule.

Application may be made on this form for any one or one of each of the categories of appliances required to be registered. Where more than one of any of the categories are required to be registered a separate application should be made for each unit.

Owner, in relation to a boiler or pressure vessel, includes any person who is in possession of the boiler or pressure vessel under an agreement of hire purchase or under a contract between a supplier of boilers or pressure vessels, or the agent of any such supplier, and such person for the sale of the boiler or pressure vessel, notwithstanding that the property in the boiler or pressure vessel has not passed to such person, and, where the owner of a boiler or pressure vessel cannot be found or ascertained or is absent from Hong Kong or is under a disability also includes the agent of the owner.
